flawed_nl_solution:
The dress was $50 and 30% off so 50*0.3 = $<<50*0.3=15>>15 discount price
The dress cost $50 minus $15 (30% off discount) so 50-15 = $<<50-15=38>>38
#### 38

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 38. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
